name: Hound of the Night
description: The Hound of the Night is a large and formidable creature with exceptional attributes in Strength and Dexterity. It has a powerful bite and features frost-like characteristics indicative of its cold damage ability.
memorable: Its ability to teleport and its advantages on tracking fey creatures make it a unique foe during combat.
goals: Typically seeks to hunt and track down prey, especially those of fey origin.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other fey creatures or serve as a guardian for a more powerful entity.
environment: Often found in dark, cold environments where it can leverage its abilities effectively.
strengths: Possesses strong melee capabilities and impressive tracking skills, particularly against fey targets.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage, allowing for strategic counterattacks from knowledgeable opponents.
attacks: Can deliver vicious bite attacks that inflict piercing and cold damage, potentially knocking foes prone.
most_powerful_ability: Frost Breath attack deals significant cold damage in a cone, affecting multiple enemies.
senses: The hound has keen senses with a passive Perception of 15, allowing it to detect hidden foes easily.
skills: Skilled in Stealth and Intimidation, enhances its ambush potential.
additional_information: Immunities to cold damage enhance its survivability in icy environments.
Ability to track fey even through the Border Ethereal makes it a relentless pursuer.
Multiattack feature allows it to strike quickly in combat.
Teleportation ability adds strategic versatility during encounters.
Possesses darkvision to see in low-light conditions.
test_queries: large cold damage creature with teleportation abilities
hound that hunts fey with cold attacks
skirmishing monster with keen tracking skills
